pageContext.claim: “For the constant criticism from the Do Nothing Democrats and their Fake News partners, here is the newest chart on our great testing 'miracle' compared to other countries. Dems and LameStream Media should be proud of the USA, instead of always ripping us down! [Trump attached a chart in this tweet showing raw numbers for coronavirus tests by country.]”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tweeted a chart showing the United States leading internationally in raw numbers for covid-19 tests. But the key indicator is tests per capita -- how many tests are performed per thousand people or per million people. Widespread testing is done not just to count the patients, but to measure how quickly and widely the contagion is spreading. When the chart is adjusted to show tests per 1,000 people, the United States lags Canada and Germany.
